items.title: After his ICE agents arrested hundreds of South Korean workers, Trump says he doesn’t want to ‘frighten off’ foreign investment in the U.S.
items.description: South Korean President Lee Jae Myung called the raid "bewildering" and warned Thursday that the raid could discourage future investment.

items.title: The Federal Reserve is about to have an extremely awkward meeting
items.description: While there is little doubt about the outcome of the Fed meeting, there are still questions over who exactly will be voting.

items.title: North Korean hackers used ChatGPT to help forge deepfake ID
items.description: Attackers used the artificial intelligence tool to craft a fake draft of a South Korean military identification card.

items.title: Just days before the Fed meeting, Trump continues push to oust Lisa Cook despite new evidence that undermines his claims
items.description: Sunday’s filing is the latest step in an unprecedented effort by the White House to shape the historically independent Fed.

items.title: This housing data is the ‘most critical economic variable’ for predicting recessions, and it’s now at the lowest level since pandemic shutdowns
items.description: Moody’s own leading economic indicator that uses machine learning has estimated the odds of a recession in the next 12 months are now at 48%.
